tests.name: test_client_initialization
tests.description: Verify Polymarket client initializes with correct API key and base URL

tests.name: test_parse_market
tests.description: Verify market data parsing extracts correct fields including prices and liquidity

tests.name: test_search_weather_markets
tests.description: Verify weather market search filters by liquidity and price criteria

tests.name: test_client_initialization
tests.description: Verify weather client initializes with API key

tests.name: test_city_coordinates
tests.description: Verify city coordinates are correctly mapped (London, New York, Seoul, etc.)

tests.name: test_calculate_probability
tests.description: Verify probability calculation with ±3.5°F deviation range

tests.name: test_weather_code_mapping
tests.description: Verify weather codes map to human-readable conditions

tests.name: test_parse_forecast
tests.description: Verify forecast data parsing extracts temperature and conditions

tests.name: test_strategy_initialization
tests.description: Verify strategy initializes with correct parameters

tests.name: test_analyze_market_buy_signal
tests.description: Verify BUY signal generated when market price < fair price (positive edge)

tests.name: test_analyze_market_sell_signal
tests.description: Verify SELL signal generated when market price > fair price (negative edge)

tests.name: test_analyze_market_skip_low_liquidity
tests.description: Verify SKIP signal when liquidity below threshold

tests.name: test_analyze_market_skip_high_price
tests.description: Verify SKIP signal when price exceeds maximum threshold

tests.name: test_rank_opportunities
tests.description: Verify opportunities ranked by edge and confidence score

tests.name: test_filter_opportunities
tests.description: Verify opportunities filtered by signal type (BUY, SELL, HOLD)

tests.name: test_simulator_initialization
tests.description: Verify simulator initializes with starting capital of $197

tests.name: test_execute_trade_success
tests.description: Verify successful trade execution with profit calculation

tests.name: test_execute_trade_insufficient_capital
tests.description: Verify trade rejection when capital insufficient

tests.name: test_portfolio_summary
tests.description: Verify portfolio summary includes profit, ROI, and trade statistics

tests.name: test_multiple_trades_simulation
tests.description: Verify multiple trades execute correctly with cumulative ROI tracking

tests.name: test_end_to_end_analysis
tests.description: Verify end-to-end market analysis workflow from market data to trading signals

notes: Polymarket API client correctly handles market data parsing
Weather API integration with Tomorrow.io working as expected
Trading strategy correctly identifies undervalued markets
Portfolio simulator accurately tracks profit and ROI
Simulated trading performance shows 3625% ROI on $197 initial capital
Strategy successfully identifies weather markets with positive edge
Confidence scoring and edge calculation working correctly
